Text: Damn, 15 minutes after it got done airing on TV, it's on here! Thanks again, VTV!!!
this show should be called terra ble

@JackOff, if its so "terra ble" as you so cleverly came up with why are you looking for the show on here? And if you looked it up to comment that it was "terra ble" you could've at least came up with something better and more original than that. Or are you just that simple minded and have no life?

So far i have enjoyed every episode of Terra Nova, thanks for the upload :)

A/10
